sub_fields.label: Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: The link text will be used as the label for screen readers, etc. Use text that is clear out of context and concise.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: content
sub_fields.instructions: This field is displayed ABOVE the pricing toggle switch.

sub_fields.label: Sub Content
sub_fields.name: sub_content
sub_fields.instructions: This field is displayed BELOW the pricing toggle switch.
